content: Heya, I just submitted an issue to GitHub - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/6534 - I'm curious what first impressions are from folks, and if there's interest + support, I'd be very interested in spending some time this weekend building the lint!
(that being said, I am a noob, if someone sees something obviously wrong with this idea, I'd be happy to play with other ideas for contributing)
I think this would be a good lint.
